Information.Name: smartfolder
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, container, tablecell, accordeon, dialog_2, vdomclass

Attribute.Name: data
Attribute.DefaultValue: [{ "guid": "guid-of-the-folder", "type": 'folder or group', "name": "folderName", "icon": "/24e377d1-e9e2-f6ff-bb5a-16e4230f3b50.res", "deletable": true, "editable": true, "changeIconButton": false, "movable": true, "checkable": true, "uploadIcon": true, "presetIcons": ["1.gif","2.gif"] }]

Language.Sentence: The Smart Folder presentation type produces an object that allows manipulations with groups of Smart Folders.
Define if drag-and-drop is used or not
Define if drag-and-drop is used or not
Define if drag-and-drop is used or not

Type.SourceCode:
import sys import json import collections class VDOM_smartfolder(VDOM_object): def render(self, parent, contents=""): woid = u"" + (self.id).replace('-', '_') id = u"o_" + woid display = u"display:none;" if self.visible == "0" else u"" classname = u"""class="%s" """ % self.classname if self.classname else u"" classname_item = 'sf-item' style_zindex = u"z-index:%s;" % self.zindex if int(self.zindex) <> 0 else u"" #style = u"""{display} {zind} position: {pos}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px; width: {width}px; height: {height}px; """\ style = u"""{display} {zind} position: {pos}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px;"""\ .format( display = display, zind = style_zindex, pos = self.position, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height ) html_items = u"" js_items_data = u"" ### javascript if self.draggable == '1': js_drag = u""" $j("#%(id)s .items .%(class)s").draggable({ containment: 'document', revert: 'invalid', revertDuration: 200, zIndex: 99999, opacity: 0.6, helper: 'original', cursor: 'default', start: function(e,u){ var x = $j('#%(id)s').data("sf"), i = $j(this).attr('index'); execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "dragstart", {item: x[i]}, true); } }); $j("#%(id)s .items .%(class)s").droppable({ accept: ".%(class)s", //activeClass: "%(class)s-hover", hoverClass: "%(class)s-hover", drop: function(e,u) { $j(u.draggable).fadeOut(100); var x = $j('#%(id)s').data("sf"), i1 = $j(u.draggable).attr('index'), i2 = $j(this).attr('index'); execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "drop", {"itemsource": x[i1], "itemtarget": x[i2]}, true); } }); """ % { "id": id, "woid": woid, "class": classname_item } else: js_drag = "" js_base = u""" $j('#%(id)s') %(js_items_data)s ; $j("#%(id)s .items .%(class)s").bind('click dblclick', function(e){ if (e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault(); else e.returnValue = false; var t = $j(this); if (e.type == 'dblclick') { %(id)s_doo = false; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemdblclick", {"id":t.attr("index")}); } else { setTimeout(function() { if (%(id)s_doo == true) { var x = $j('#%(id)s').data("sf"), i = $j(this).attr('index'); %(id)s_current_item = x[i]; $j('#%(id)s>.%(class)s').removeClass('selected'); $j(this).addClass('selected'); execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemclick", {"id":t.attr("index")}); } }, 300); %(id)s_doo = true; } return false; }); $j("#%(id)s .items .%(class)s").hover(function(e){ execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemmouseover", {"id":$j(this).attr("index")}); return false; },function(e){ execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemmouseout", {"id":$j(this).attr("index")}); return false; }); """ % { "id": id, "woid": woid, "class": classname_item, "js_items_data": js_items_data } if self.testhtml != '': js_drag = "" js_add = "" testhtml = self.testhtml % { "id": id, "woid": woid, "class": classname_item } else: testhtml = "" js_add = u""" /* // it in click, see upper $j("#%(id)s .items .%(class)s").click(function(){ var x = $j('#%(id)s').data("sf"), i = $j(this).attr('index'); %(id)s_current_item = x[i]; $j('#%(id)s>.%(class)s').removeClass('selected'); $j(this).addClass('selected'); }); */ /* $j("#%(id)s>.controls div.control").click(function(){ var t = $j(this); if (t.hasClass('add')) { var n = ''; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "newsmartfolder", {"name": n}, true); } else if (t.hasClass('edit')) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "rename", {}, true); } else if (t.hasClass('delete')) { var x = []; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "delete", {"guids": x}, true); } else if (t.hasClass('group')) { var x = [], n = ''; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "group", {"groupname": n, "guids": x}, true); } else if (t.hasClass('ungroup')) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "ungroup", {}, true); } return false; }); */ $j("#%(id)s .controls div.control").click(function(){ var t = $j(this), sf = $j("#%(id)s"); if (t.hasClass('add')) { if (sf.data('sf_selectmode') == 0) { var n = prompt("Please enter name for new folder:","New Folder"); if (n) { n = $j.trim(n); if (n == '') { alert('Folder name is empty'); } else { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "newsmartfolder", {"name": n}, true); } } } else { alert('Not allowed in select mode'); } } else if (t.hasClass('edit')) { if (sf.data('sf_selectmode') == 0) { var o = sf.data('sf_current_item') || false; if (!o) { alert('No folder selected'); } else { var n = prompt("Please enter new name:",o.data('sf').name); if (n) { n = $j.trim(n); if (n == '') { alert('Folder name is empty'); } else { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "rename", {"guid": o.data('sf').guid, "name": n}, true); } } } } else { alert('Not allowed in select mode'); } } else if (t.hasClass('delete')) { var x = sf.data('sf_items_selected') || []; if (x.length) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "delete", {"guidlist": x}, true); } else { var o = sf.data('sf_current_item') || false; if (o) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "delete", {"guidlist": [o.data('sf').guid]}, true); } } } else if (t.hasClass('group')) { var gs = sf.data('sf_items_selected') || []; if (gs.length) { var n = prompt("Please enter name for new group:","New Group"); if (n) { n = $j.trim(n); if (n == '') { alert('Group name is empty'); } else { var x = sf.data('sf_items_selected') || []; if (x.length) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "group", {"name": n, "guidlist": x}, true); } } } } else { alert('No items selected'); } } else if (t.hasClass('ungroup')) { if (sf.data('sf_selectmode') == 0) { var x = sf.data('sf_current_item') || []; if (x.length) { execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "ungroup", {"guid": x.data('sf').guid}, true); } else { alert('Group is not specified'); } } else { alert('Not allowed in select mode'); } } return false; }); $j("#%(id)s .controls .selectmode").click(function(){ var t = $j(this), s = 'selectmode-selected', sf = $j("#%(id)s"); if (t.hasClass(s)) { $j(sf).data({ 'sf_selectmode': 0, 'sf_items_selected': [] }); $j(".items .%(class)s",sf).removeClass('selected').droppable('enable').draggable('enable'); t.removeClass(s); $j(".items",sf).removeClass('selectmode'); } else { $j(sf).data('sf_selectmode', 1); $j(".items .%(class)s",sf).droppable('disable').draggable('disable'); var x = $j(".items .selected:first",sf).data('sf'); if (typeof x !== 'undefined' && typeof x.guid !== 'undefined') vdom_sf_selected_add(sf, x.guid); t.addClass(s); $j(".items",sf).addClass('selectmode'); } return false; }); function vdom_sf_set_drag(sfid) { $j(".items .%(class)s",sfid).draggable({ containment: 'document', revert: 'invalid', revertDuration: 200, zIndex: 99999, opacity: 0.6, helper: 'original', cursor: 'default', start: function(e,u){ console.info(u.helper.data()); /* $j(".items .%(class)s",sfid).live('click',function(){ var t = $j(this), s = 'selected', sc = 'current', sa; var x = t.data("sf"); if (sfid.data('sf_selectmode') == 0) { sfid.data('sf_current_item', t); t.parents('.items').find('.sf-item').removeClass(sc); t.addClass(sc); } else { if (x.noselect !== '1') { if (t.hasClass(s)) { t.removeClass(s); vdom_sf_selected_remove(sfid, x.guid); } else { t.addClass(s); vdom_sf_selected_add(sfid, x.guid); } } } return false; }); */ %(id)s_doo = false; $j(".items .%(class)s",sfid).live('click dblclick', function(e){ if (e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault(); else e.returnValue = false; var t = $j(this); var x = t.data("sf"); if (e.type == 'dblclick') { %(id)s_doo = false; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemdblclick", {"guid":x.guid}); } else { setTimeout(function() { if (%(id)s_doo == true) { // click //execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemclick", {"id":t.attr("dataid")}); var s = 'selected', sc = 'current', sa; if (sfid.data('sf_selectmode') == 0) { sfid.data('sf_current_item', t); t.parents('.items').find('.sf-item').removeClass(sc); t.addClass(sc); } else { if (x.noselect !== '1') { if (t.hasClass(s)) { t.removeClass(s); vdom_sf_selected_remove(sfid, x.guid); } else { t.addClass(s); vdom_sf_selected_add(sfid, x.guid); } } } } }, 250); %(id)s_doo = true; } return false; }); $j(".pathway a",sfid).live('click',function(){ execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "itemclick", {"guid": $j(this).attr('guid')}, true); return false; }); $j(".pages a",sfid).live('click',function(){ var page = parseInt($j(this).attr('rel'),10); if (page <= 0) page = 1; sfid.data('sf_current_page', page); var pa = sfid.data('sf_path'); var p = (pa.length > 0) ? pa[pa.length-1] : ''; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "requestdata", {"guid": p.guid, 'offset': sfid.data('sf_items_per_page')*(page-1), 'limit': sfid.data('sf_items_per_page') }, true); return false; }); } function vdom_sf_selected_add(sfid, guid){ var sa = sfid.data('sf_items_selected'); var x = $j.inArray(guid, sa); if (x < 0) { sa.push(guid); sfid.data('sf_items_selected', sa); } } function vdom_sf_selected_remove(sfid, guid){ var sa = sfid.data('sf_items_selected'); var x = $j.inArray(guid, sa); if (x >= 0) { sa.splice(x,1); sfid.data('sf_items_selected', sa); } } function vdom_sf_refresh(sfid){ var sf = $j('#'+sfid); var p = sf.data('sf_path') || [], guid = '', ofs = 0; if (p.length) { guid = p[p.length-1]; } sf.data('sf_current_item', null); var page = parseInt(sf.data('sf_current_page'),10) - 1; var per = parseInt(sf.data('sf_items_per_page'),10); if (page < 0) page = 0; if (per <= 0) per = 1; ofs = page * per; execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "requestdata", {"guid": guid, "offset": ofs, "limit": per}, true); } function vdom_sf_goto(path){ execEventBinded('%(woid)s', "requestdata", {"guid": '', "offset": '', "limit": ''}, true); } function vdom_sf_disable(id){ $j('#'+id+' .sf-disabled').fadeIn('fast'); } function vdom_sf_enable(id){ $j('#'+id+' .sf-disabled').fadeOut('fast'); } function vdom_sf_load(id,path,total,data){ var sf = $j('#'+id); sf.data('sf_path', path); sf.data('sf_items_count', total); sf.data('sf_current_item', null); if (typeof data === 'array' || typeof data === 'object') { var d = $j('
'); $j.each(data, function(i,e){ var a = { guid: e['guid'] || 'no-guid', type: e['type'] || 'no-type', name: e['name'] || 'no-name', icon: e['icon'] || '', nodelete: e['nodelete'] || '', noedit: e['noedit'] || '', nomove: e['nomove'] || '', noselect: e['noselect'] || '' }; var s = $j( '
'+a['name']+'
' ); if (a['nomove'] == '1') s.append('
'+a['name']+'
' ); if (a['nomove'] == '1') s.addClass('nomove'); if (a['nodelete'] == '1') s.addClass('nodelete'); if (a['noedit'] == '1') s.addClass('noedit'); if (a['noselect'] == '1') s.addClass('noselect'); if (a['type'] == 'group') s.addClass('group'); if (sf.data('sf_items_selected').indexOf(e['guid']) >= 0) s.addClass('selected'); s.appendTo(d).data('sf', a); }); } $j('.items',sf).html('').append($j('>div',d)); d = []; if (typeof path === 'array' || typeof path === 'object') { $.each(path, function(i,e){ if (i < path.length - 1) { d.push(""+e['name']+""); } else { d.push(""+e['name']+""); } }); } $j('.pathway',sf).html(d.join(' / ')); // pages d = []; var ii, tot = parseInt(total, 10), ipp = parseInt(sf.data('sf_items_per_page'),10), curp = parseInt(sf.data('sf_current_page'),10); if (tot <= 0) tot = 1; if (ipp <= 0) ipp = 1; if (curp <= 0) curp = 1; var pages = parseInt(tot / ipp, 10); if (tot %% ipp > 0) pages++; for (ii = 1; ii <= pages; ii++) { if (curp == ii) { d.push(""+ii+""); } else { d.push(""+ii+""); } } $j('.pages',sf).html(d.join(' ')); //vdom_sf_set_handlers(sf); //vdom_sf_set_drag(sf); } function vdom_sf_init(id,page,per,sel){ var sf=$j('#'+id); sf.data({ 'sf_selectmode': 0, 'sf_current_item': null, 'sf_current_page': parseInt(page,10) || 1, 'sf_items_count': 0, 'sf_items_per_page': parseInt(per,10) || 6, 'sf_items_selected': sel || [] }).find('.items').html(''); $j('.sf-disabled',sf).css({ opacity: 0.7, width: '100%%', height: '100%%' }); vdom_sf_set_handlers(sf); } vdom_sf_init('%(id)s', 1, 4); """ % { "id": id, "woid": woid, "class": classname_item } ### pages currentpage = int(self.currentpage) if currentpage <= 0: currentpage = 1 itemsperpage = int(self.itemsperpage) if itemsperpage <= 0: itemsperpage = 1 ### consolidate javascript js = u"""""" % { "id": id, "woid": woid, "js_drag": js_drag, "class": classname_item, "js_base": js_base, "js_add": js_add, "offset": str(itemsperpage*(currentpage-1)), "limit": str(itemsperpage) } ### styles css = u"""""" % { "id": id, "class": classname_item, "itemwidth": self.itemwidth, "itemheight": self.itemheight, "width": self.width, "height": self.height } ### parse toolbar's options try: tb_opt = json.loads(self.toolbar) except Exception as e: tb_opt = { "show": 1, "buttons": { "edit": { "show": 1, "title": "Edit" }, "add": { "show": 1, "title": "Add Smart Folder" }, "delete": { "show": 1, "title": "Delete" }, "group": { "show": 1, "title": "Group" }, "ungroup": { "show": 1, "title": "Ungroup" }, "selectmode": { "show": 1, "title": "Select mode" } } } debug("Error [json.loads(toolbar) in smartfolder type]: %s" % str(e)) if 'buttons' in tb_opt: b = tb_opt['buttons'] tb_opt_b_edit = int(b['edit']['show']) if 'edit' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_add = int(b['add']['show']) if 'add' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_delete = int(b['delete']['show']) if 'delete' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_group = int(b['group']['show']) if 'group' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_ungroup = int(b['ungroup']['show']) if 'ungroup' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_selectmode = int(b['selectmode']['show']) if 'selectmode' in b else 1 tb_opt_b_edit_title = b['edit']['title'] if 'edit' in b else 'Edit' tb_opt_b_add_title = b['add']['title'] if 'add' in b else 'Add Smart Folder' tb_opt_b_delete_title = b['delete']['title'] if 'delete' in b else 'Delete' tb_opt_b_group_title = b['group']['title'] if 'group' in b else 'Group' tb_opt_b_ungroup_title = b['ungroup']['title'] if 'ungroup' in b else 'Ungroup' tb_opt_b_selectmode_title = b['selectmode']['title'] if 'selectmode' in b else 'Select Mode' else: tb_opt_b_edit = 1 tb_opt_b_add = 1 tb_opt_b_delete = 1 tb_opt_b_group = 1 tb_opt_b_ungroup = 1 tb_opt_b_selectmode = 1 tb_opt_b_edit_title = u'Edit' tb_opt_b_add_title = u'Add Smart Folder' tb_opt_b_delete_title = u'Delete' tb_opt_b_group_title = u'Group' tb_opt_b_ungroup_title = u'Ungroup' tb_opt_b_selectmode_title = u'Select Mode' tb_opt_show = int(tb_opt['show']) if "show" in tb_opt else 1 shide = u"style='display:none'" toolbar = u"""
%(b0name)s
%(b1name)s
%(b2name)s
%(b3name)s
%(b4name)s
%(b5name)s
""" % { "chide": "" if tb_opt_show == 1 else shide, "b0hide": "" if tb_opt_b_selectmode == 1 else shide, "b1hide": "" if tb_opt_b_add == 1 else shide, "b2hide": "" if tb_opt_b_edit == 1 else shide, "b3hide": "" if tb_opt_b_delete == 1 else shide, "b4hide": "" if tb_opt_b_group == 1 else shide, "b5hide": "" if tb_opt_b_ungroup == 1 else shide, "b0name": tb_opt_b_selectmode_title, "b1name": tb_opt_b_add_title, "b2name": tb_opt_b_edit_title, "b3name": tb_opt_b_delete_title, "b4name": tb_opt_b_group_title, "b5name": tb_opt_b_ungroup_title, "id": id, "class": classname_item } ### pathway pathway_visible = u"style='display:none'" if self.pathway == "0" else u"" pathway = u"
" ### debug info if VDOM_CONFIG_1["DEBUG"] == "1": debug_info = u"objtype='smartfolder' objname='%s' ver='2012-02-07'" % self.name else: debug_info = u"" ### out result = u"""{css}
{toolbar}{pathway}
{items}
{js}{testhtml}"""\ .format( debug_info = debug_info, id = id, style = style, items = html_items, js = js, css = css, testhtml = testhtml, toolbar = toolbar, pathway = pathway ) return VDOM_object.render(self, parent, contents=result) def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): import utils.wysiwyg image_id = "24e377d1-e9e2-f6ff-bb5a-16e4230f3b50" result = utils.wysiwyg.get_empty_wysiwyg_value(self, image_id) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result) def set_attr(app_id, object_id, param): css = """ #%(id)s { } #%(id)s .items { } #%(id)s .items .%(class)s { } #%(id)s .items .%(class)s-hover { } #%(id)s .controls { } #%(id)s .controls .control { } #%(id)s .controls .control { } #%(id)s .controls .control:hover { } #%(id)s .controls .control:active { } """ o = application.objects.search(object_id) if "skin" in param: if param["skin"]["value"] == "1": o.set_attributes({"style": css}) #elif param["skin"]["value"] == "2": # o.set_attributes({"style": eof_style}) if "style" in param and param["style"]["value"] and o.attributes.style != css: o.set_attributes({"skin": 0}) return ""
